    • Constructor Detail

      • Dirt

        public Dirt()
        Constructor All dirt are represented by a '.' character. Since dirt are not able to grow fruits, there it's Capability is set to DEAD.

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick​(Location location)
        Ground can also experience the joy of time. Here, we have 3 possibilities which will happen in any turn, on any square of dirt: - each square of dirt has 0.5% chances to grow a bush - any square of dirt that is next to at least 2 square of bushes has a 10% to grow a bush. - any square of dirt that is next to a tree: Ground will be converted from Dirt to Bush if it met the conditions above.
        Overrides:
        tick in class Ground
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the Ground

      • aliveBushCount

        private int aliveBushCount​(Location location)
        This method is used to calculate the number of alive Bush in the adjacent squares of current location.
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the Ground
        Returns:
        An integer represents the total number of alive bush in the adjacent square of the current location.

      • aliveTreeCount

        private int aliveTreeCount​(Location location)
        This method is used to calculate the number of alive Tree in the adjacent squares of current location.
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the Ground
        Returns:
        An integer represents the total number of alive tree in the adjacent square of the current location.
